title: enerQuick - refuel smart
summary: enerQuick for Germany - refuel "smart" – Refuel always at the ideal time!
developerAddress:

description: enerQuick for Germany - refuel "smart" – Refuel always at the ideal time with the intelligent refuelling recommendation, price forecast and personal price alert. Get a quick overview of the current prices of all gas stations nearby and reach them quickly via navigation. Benefit from more useful functions, such as route search, favorites, personal refuel stats and ratings. And start today with optimizing your fuel costs!enerQuick Overview:•On-View: Get the cheapest gas station nearby right at the start •Offers real-time price data from the market transparency agency of the federal government •Search for gas stations and prices nearby•Find directions•Get price recommendation a along a route•Intelligent price forecast – “refuel at the right time”•Define your own favorites and get prices alerts•Reviews•Additional information about the gas stations, such as opening hours, car wash, garage service and toilets•Smart statistics: personal fuel costs, savings and price development on the marketNote: The location and price data as well as the opening hours of the stations are used from enerQuick are provided by the market transparency agency for fuels (MTS-K). Service options such as car wash, garage service, toilets and the ratings are from our users. Therefore, we can’t assume any responsibility for the accuracy, currency and completeness of the data.
descriptionHTML:
enerQuick for Germany - refuel "smart" – Refuel always at the ideal time with the intelligent refuelling recommendation, price forecast and personal price alert. Get a quick overview of the current prices of all gas stations nearby and reach them quickly via navigation. Benefit from more useful functions, such as route search, favorites, personal refuel stats and ratings. And start today with optimizing your fuel costs!

enerQuick Overview:

•On-View: Get the cheapest gas station nearby right at the start
•Offers real-time price data from the market transparency agency of the federal government
•Search for gas stations and prices nearby
•Find directions
•Get price recommendation a along a route
•Intelligent price forecast – “refuel at the right time”
•Define your own favorites and get prices alerts
•Reviews
•Additional information about the gas stations, such as opening hours, car wash, garage service and toilets
•Smart statistics: personal fuel costs, savings and price development on the market

Note:

The location and price data as well as the opening hours of the stations are used from enerQuick are provided by the market transparency agency for fuels (MTS-K). Service options such as car wash, garage service, toilets and the ratings are from our users. Therefore, we can’t assume any responsibility for the accuracy, currency and completeness of the data.
recentChanges: Small bugfixes and improvement of stability
